016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonResolver;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
029import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLMapper;
030
031import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
032import java.net.URL;
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.function.Supplier;
037
038/**
039 * @author rickardoberg
040 * @since 20/04/2022
041 */
042public record Configuration(ObjectNode json)
043        implements JsonElement {
044
045    private static final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
046
047    public static Configuration empty() {
048        return new Configuration(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
049    }
050
051    public static Supplier<RuntimeException> missing(String name) {
052        return () -> new IllegalArgumentException("Missing configuration setting '" + name + "'");
053    }
054
055    public record Builder(ObjectNode builder)
056            implements With<Builder> {
057
058        public Builder() {
059            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
060        }
061
062        ObjectNode navigateToParentOfPropertyNameThenAdd(ObjectNode node, String name, JsonNode value) {
063            int i = name.indexOf(".");
064            if (i == -1) {
065                // name is the last element in path to navigate, navigation complete.
066                if (node.path(name).isArray()) {
067                    ((ArrayNode) node.get(name)).add(value);
068                } else {
069                    node.set(name, value);
070                }
071                return node;
072            }
073            String childElement = name.substring(0, i);
074            String remainingName = name.substring(i + 1);
075            JsonNode child = node.get(childElement);
076            ObjectNode childObjectNode;
077            if (child == null || child.isNull()) {
078                // non-existent json-node, need to create child object node
079                childObjectNode = node.putObject(childElement);
080            } else {
081                // existing json-node, ensure that it can be navigated through
082                if (!child.isObject()) {
083                    throw new RuntimeException("Attempted to navigate through json key that already exists, but is not a json-object that support navigation.");
084                }
085                childObjectNode = (ObjectNode) child;
086            }
087            // TODO support arrays, for now we only support object navigation
088            return navigateToParentOfPropertyNameThenAdd(childObjectNode, remainingName, value);
089        }
090
091        public Builder add(String name, JsonNode value) {
092            navigateToParentOfPropertyNameThenAdd(builder, name, value);
093            return this;
094        }
095
096        public Builder add(String name, String value) {
097            return add(name, builder.textNode(value));
098        }
099
100        public Builder add(String name, long value) {
101            return add(name, builder.numberNode(value));
102        }
103
104        public Builder add(String name, double value) {
105            return add(name, builder.numberNode(value));
106        }
107
108        public Builder add(String name, boolean value) {
109            return add(name, builder.booleanNode(value));
110        }
111
112        public Builder add(String name, Object value) {
113            return add(name, mapper.valueToTree(value));
114        }
115
116        public Builder remove(String name) {
117            builder.remove(name);
118            return this;
119        }
120
121        public Configuration build() {
122            // Resolve any references
123            return new Configuration(new JsonResolver().apply(builder, builder));
124        }
125
126        @Override
127        public String toString() {
128            ObjectWriter objectWriter = new YAMLMapper().writer().withDefaultPrettyPrinter();
129            try {
130                return objectWriter.writeValueAsString(builder);
131            } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
132                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
133            }
134        }
135    }
136
137    public Configuration getConfiguration(String name) {
138        return getJson(name)
139                .map(ObjectNode.class::cast).map(Configuration::new)
140                .orElseGet(() -> new Configuration(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode()));
141    }
142
143    public List<Configuration> getConfigurations(String name) {
144        return getJson(name)
145                .map(ArrayNode.class::cast)
146                .map(a -> JsonElement.getValuesAs(a, Configuration::new))
147                .orElseGet(Collections::emptyList);
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * Retrieve a configuration value that represents a resource path URL.
152     * It will try to resolve the name using ClassLoader.getSystemResource(path), to find the actual
153     * path of the resource, given the current classpath and modules.
154     *
155     * @param name
156     * @return
157     */
158    public Optional<URL> getResourceURL(String name) {
159        return getString(name).flatMap(Resources::getResource);
160    }
161
162    public Builder asBuilder() {
163        return new Builder(json);
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public String toString() {
168        ObjectWriter objectWriter = new YAMLMapper().writer().withDefaultPrettyPrinter();
169        try {
170            return objectWriter.writeValueAsString(json);
171        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
172            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
173        }
174    }
175}
176
